Enums/DFUError.html#/c:@M@iOSDFULibrary@.name: extendedInitPacketRequired

Enums/DFUError.html#/c:@M@iOSDFULibrary@.name: initPacketRequired
Enums/DFUError.html#/c:@M@iOSDFULibrary@.abstract: Before SDK 7.0.0 the init packet could have contained only 2-byte CRC value, and was optional.

Enums/DFUError.html#/c:@M@iOSDFULibrary@.name: bytesLost
Enums/DFUError.html#/c:@M@iOSDFULibrary@.abstract: Error raised during upload when the number of bytes sent is not equal to number of bytes confirmed in Packet Receipt Notification.

Enums/DFUError.html#/c:@M@iOSDFULibrary@.name: crcError
Enums/DFUError.html#/c:@M@iOSDFULibrary@.abstract: Error raised when the CRC reported by the remote device does not match. Service has done 3 tries to send the data.

Enums/DFUFirmwareType.html.name: DFUFirmwareType

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Log level. Logger application may filter log entries based on their level. Levels allow to ignore less important messages.
